goal.ch:
- 取得世界及台灣地震目錄
- 了解地震預報方法- 地震預報實作
- 地震紀錄及工程地震上之應用
- 地震及強地動之基礎概念
- 地震危害分析及其應用
- 地震危害分析實作
goal.en:
“- Obtain earthquake catalogue for earthquake in the globe and Taiwan- Understand approaches for earthquake forecasting- Practice earthquake forecasting approach“
“- Learning earthquake records and their applications for engineering purpose- Understanding factors of earthquake and strong ground motion- Introducing seismic hazard assessments and its applications- Assessing seismic hazard assessment practically“

outline.ch:
“- 課程簡介、大綱與分組- 地震與全球板塊構造- 地震資料與處理- 大地震預報方法- 全球地震深度分布- 小組報告- 地震學方法預報地震的限制- 活動斷層參數- 利用活動斷層參數預報地震- 台灣地震目錄
“- 地震危害分析及課程介紹- 地震規模及震度- 地震紀錄：歷史文獻紀錄及儀器紀錄- 孕震構造- 最大地震規模- 強地動評估- 定值式與概率式地震危害分析- 利用「OPENQUAKE」程式計算地震危害“
outline.en:
- Introduction, outline, and grouping - Earthquake and global plate tectonics- Data used- Methods for forecasting probabilities of large earthquakes- Global earthquakes in different depth ranges- Group presentations for earthquake forecasting- Limitation of these seismological approaches - Active fault parameters- Earthquakes forecasting considering active faults- Earthquake catalogues in Taiwan
- An introduction of seismic hazard assessment- Magnitude and intensity scales- Seismic records: historical and instrumental records- Seismotetonic sources- The maximum magnitudes of earthquakes- Earthquake strong ground motion- Deterministic and probabilistic seismic hazard assessments- Seismic hazard assessment through the ‘OPENQUAKE’ software
